name: Ghost
description: Undetectable by enemy UAVs while moving, planting or defusing bombs, or controlling scorestreaks.

name: Team Link
description: See friendly teammates through walls and reveal a Fog of War circle around you and your teammates.

name: Dead Silence
description: Move quietly and resist detection from Acoustic Sensor.

name: Tracker
description: See digital imprint of enemy footsteps and recieve an alert on your HUD when revealed in the enemy Fog of War.
